channel.title: Tech on DevPlayG
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on DevPlayG

item.title: Go - Interface as Parameter to Function
item.description: Heading 3 func OpenVideoCapture(v interface{}) (*VideoCapture, error) { switch vv := v.(type) { case int: return VideoCaptureDevice(vv) case string: id, err := strconv.Atoi(vv) if err == nil { return VideoCaptureDevice(id) } return VideoCaptureFile(vv) default: return nil, errors.

item.title: Bash tips
item.description: Get current directory DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"

item.title: PostgreSQL tips
item.description: List users \du \du+ Add user postgres=# create role won; CREATE ROLE postgres=# \du won List of roles Role name | Attributes | Member of -----------+--------------+----------- won | Cannot login | {} alter role won LOGIN password 'won'; Use database \c fabricexplorer List databases \l \l+
